item.title: Getting started with ipython-notebook
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting ipython-notebook set up or installed: Please Note: iPython Notebook is now no longer supported as all of the functionality has been moved into to the Jupyter project. Prerequisite # To install Jupyter or iPython Notebook you must have python installed at at least version 2.7.3+ or 3.3+ - python can be installed from the main python site, from your Linux/OS-X distribution or as one of the bundled packages such as Anaconda recommended.
